snippet: There aren’t three million unauthorized immigrant criminals to deport, and that is only the first flaw in his strategy....
abstract: Editorial disputes Pres-elect Donald J Trump's claim that he will move to deport up to three million undocumented immigrant criminals; argues that there are not that many in first place, and that deporting even several hundred thousand undocumented felons is logistically, legally and morally dubious; calls on local leaders to risk loss of federal funding by resisting pressure to carry out mass deportations (Series: What's at Stake).
lead_paragraph: There aren’t three million unauthorized immigrant criminals to deport, and that is only the first flaw in his strategy.

headline.print_headline: Mr. Trump’s Plan to Purge the Nation
